column4: random question, anyone know command to open multiple ie tabs using vbacript? work sucks and uses winblows
I (used to) know how to do it in waitr, and that just wraps com in ruby, so should be easy enough...
Ruby-watir is actually prety easy...maybe you could find an example and port it to vbscript (I recall this being pretty easy, but it was 3+ years ago)
